text: The 2017 Liga 3 Lampung season is the third edition of Liga 3 Lampung is a qualifying round of the 2017 Liga 3. Persilat Lampung Tengah are the defending champions. ==Teams== 19 clubs from entire Lampung will be join this league. * Group A : Persilamtim East Lampung, Putrad F.C., Ababil United, Persilu North Lampung, Lampung FC. * Group B : Infa 39 MM F.C., Karya Wiyata F.C., La Plata YONIF 143/TWEJ F.C., SS Lampung F.C.. * Group C : Mesuji F.C., Serasi F.C., PS Tanggamus, Spectra F.C., Persilat Central Lampung. * Group D : PSBL Bandar Lampung, Bintang Utama Utara, Bandar Lampung F.C., Kampus City, Projaya South Lampung. ==Champions== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center; margin: 0 auto;" |- ! Champions |- | Persilat Central Lampung |- | 2nd title |- |} ==References== Category:Lampung Category:2017 in Indonesian football Category:Sport in Lampung
title: 2017 Liga 3 Lampung
